items.checkin_comment:
0,75l Flasche in Argentinien und 330ml Flasche. Flaches Aroma. Serhr helles Gelb, wenig Schaum. Bitter ohne Nuasncen,. Flacher Geschmack ohne Abgang. Schmeckt nur kalt zu gegrilltem Rindfleisch in Argentinien.
Aroma (2)
Aussehen (3)
Flavor (3)
Mundgefühl

items.badge_description: Want to enjoy a day of brews, but need to keep your wits sharp? There are plenty of delicious brews under 5% for you to sip on throughout the day. That's 30 different beers with an ABV of 5% and lower. Try 5 more for Level 7!

items.checkin_comment: Pale yellow in the glass, nearly no head and no aroma. The beer starts a fuller than expected. A bit grainy, not too sweet. The mainpart is a bit thin, slightly grainy, nearly no bitterness. The aftertaste is medium, slightly grainy, slightly sweet.

items.badge_description: It's been a year since your last birthday on Untappd? Whoa - time flies! Happy birthday to you from all of us at Untappd!
Traveling the world is hard, but not for you. It's as easy as cracking open a new brew! You have had a beer from at least 280 different regions around the world. Try 5 more for Level 57!
Travel much? You must be a "brewsetter". That's at least a beer from 80 different countries. Try 5 more for Level 17!

user.bio: On a mission to try every beer in the world. nbd

items.badge_description: Your quest to quench your thirst leaves no stone unturned! That's at least That's 350 distinct venues!

Wine isn't the only beverage worthy of pairing with a delicious meal. With so many styles widely available, there’s a perfect pint for any cuisine of your choosing. That's a beer at 120 different venues categorized as a Restaurant. Try 5 more for Level 25!

Want to enjoy a day of brews, but need to keep your wits sharp? There are plenty of delicious brews under 5% for you to sip on throughout the day. That's 470 different beers with an ABV of 5% and lower.

The traditionally accepted payment for helping someone move, pizza & beer are one of the most perfect combinations in life. That's a beer at 10 different venues categorized as a Pizza Place. Try 5 more for Level 3!

items.badge_description:
“¡Buena Onda!” is a common phrase in Argentina that many use to say “good vibes.” While the goat has much significance in beer history, with bock beers referring to the animal for centuries, the word “GOAT” in Argentina immediately makes you think of Lionel Messi. Did you know after Messi's record-breaking 644th goal for Barcelona, he famously sent bottles of beer to all 160 goalkeepers he scored against?

That's 5 beers from breweries in Argentina. Try 5 more for Level 2!

user.bio: Beer, law, travel, tattoos, punk rock
